name: Burg_98
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with loanwords from Island Creole
sea-focused cuisine: dried fish, kelp, smoked shellfish
ritual calendar keyed to local tides and moon phases
constraints: No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialized labor
Navigational auguries do not replace charts and seamanship
notes: Strategic minor harbor serving nearby islands and coastal traders
